description: This file contains a collection of CMake functions, macros, and scripts for managing builds, dependencies, and package configurations within a CMake-based project. It includes functions for handling target properties, generating configuration files, installing modules, and various utility functions for build management and packaging.

methods.name: add_element
methods.description: Macro to append an element to a list variable.

methods.name: _get_default_link_name
methods.description: Function to derive default link name and location from a library path.

methods.name: get_if_link_libraries
methods.description: Function to retrieve linked libraries and directories for a target, resolving dependencies.

methods.name: get_if_compile_defines
methods.description: Function to gather compile definitions from a target and its dependencies.

methods.name: get_if_compile_options
methods.description: Function to gather compile options from a target and its dependencies.

methods.name: get_if_include_dirs
methods.description: Function to collect include directories for a target and its dependencies.

methods.name: InstallCMakeConfig
methods.description: Function to generate and install CMake configuration files for targets.

methods.name: InstallPackageConfig
methods.description: Function to generate and install pkg-config files for targets.

methods.name: InstallFindModule
methods.description: Function to install CMake find modules (*.cmake files) from a specified directory.

methods.name: print_properties
methods.description: Function to list all supported CMake target properties.

methods.name: print_target_properties
methods.description: Function to print properties of a specific target.

methods.name: semicolon_safe_string
methods.description: Function to replace semicolons in a string with ASCII 31 for safety.

methods.name: InstallCompatibleCMakeConfig
methods.description: Function to install CMake config for compatibility with legacy targets, including headers and dependencies.
